title: 2013 - The Year In Christian Music (Bundle 52)
description:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
2013 - THE YEAR IN CHRISTIAN MUSIC
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

I would hope that, for anyone who's followed me here on The Pirate Bay, they would know by now that I am both genuine and sincere in the work I'm trying to achieve here for Christ.  You may not all agree with my approach on certain things, but my persistence and effort should never be questioned.  So I mean it with the utmost sincerity when I thank the following 14 people who recently contributed three song recommendations for my "Various - 2013 - Piratebay Christian Music Mixtape, Vol 1" ... studog123, JWaM, sicanddisturbed, kbb81tn, lategrad, blaheiei, Varkias, BlessedMom, PaleoPirate, novice13, peteyjc, van_pyf, Steve16drcsa, and Nathan.S.

Although I am a little surprised that more people didn't participate, especially those of you whom I spend a great deal of my time routinely and quickly answer discography requests for, I am thankful for the efforts of the 14 Christians above.  And I must say that I had a chance to listen to the entire disc 2x through today, on an afternoon road trip I needed to take.  Good stuff.  So thanks again guys.  :)

A genre breakdown for this bundle...

ALTERNATIVE: A Rotterdam November, Exodus Swift, George Michael Dile.  HIP-HOP/RAP: Alex Faith, Applejaxx, Imperial And K.I.N.E.T.I.K, Lecrae, Swisaboi.  BLUES: Ann M Wolf, The Campbell Brothers, Miraculous Mule.  FOLK: At The Close of Every Day.  CONTEMPORARY: Brian Watts, Love And The Outcome.  POP: Caleb Ray, Casey Darnell.  HARDCORE/METAL: Fit For A King, Startled By Silence.  SINGER-SONGWRITER: Hunter G K Thompson, Jerry Williams.  PRAISE & WORSHIP: Jake Hamilton, Stephen Miller.  CHRISTMAS: Love And The Outcome, Mindy Smith, Phillips, Craig And Dean.  ROCK: Stryper.

We have now shared 1,507 releases amongst ourselves this year.

Bundle 52 includes the following 27 releases...

 * A Rotterdam November - 2013 - Past Present Future
 * Alex Faith - 2013 - ATLast
 * Ann M Wolf - 2013 - Nothing But The Blues Without You
 * Applejaxx - 2013 - Nerd Power
 * At The Close of Every Day - 2013 - Monsters
 * Brian Watts - 2013 - The Message Is Love
 * Caleb Ray - 2013 - This Little Light
 * Campbell Brothers, The - 2013 - Beyond The 4 Walls
 * Casey Darnell - 2013 - Casey Darnell
 * Exodus Swift - 2013 - I Am Not A Sinner
 * Fit For A King - 2013 - Ancient Waters - Single
 * George Michael Dile - 2013 - Heaven's Door
 * Hunter G K Thompson - 2013 - Gabriel Kansas EP
 * Imperial And K.I.N.E.T.I.K - 2013 - Pencils Not Pistols
 * Jake Hamilton - 2013 - Beautiful Ride
 * Jerry Williams - 2013 - Purify Me, Lord - The Psalms Project, Vol 1
 * Lecrae - 2013 - Church Clothes, Vol 2
 * Lecrae - 2013 - Church Clothes, Vol 2 - DJ Version
 * Love And The Outcome - 2013 - Emmanuel - Single
 * Love And The Outcome - 2013 - He Is With Us - Single
 * Mindy Smith - 2013 - Snowed In EP
 * Miraculous Mule - 2013 - Deep Fried
 * Phillips, Craig And Dean - 2013 - Hope For All The World
 * Startled By Silence - 2013 - As Blood Shows Love
 * Stephen Miller - 2013 - All Hail The King
 * Stryper - 2013 - No More Hell To Pay - Japanese Edition
 * Swisaboi - 2013 - The Road Less Traveled

God Above All,
TorrentTracts - November 2013
